Requiring substitution of district court judges by random selection
Provide for the partisan election of judges and justices
Generally revise injunctive powers of the judiciary
Generally revise laws regarding the separation of powers doctrine
Generally revise laws related to child abuse and neglect investigations
Revise prohibition on sale or purchase of human body parts under the revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act.
Create food safety panel
Generally revise evidentiary burdens related to child abuse and neglect cases
Provide income tax deduction up to 150% for charitable donations
Require judicial standards committee to send investigation referral to House of Representatives
Establish subtrust within the coal trust to increase educational tax credits
Establish laws related to a digital public square
Revise temporary investigative authority of department of health and human services in child abuse and neglect cases
Revise standard for emergency protective services in child abuse and neglect cases
Require department of public health and human services to file attachments to affidavit in child abuse or neglect proceedings
Create rules of conduct for child protection specialists
Revise laws related to charges of assault
Limit state government use of personal electronic data
Clarify value of caselaw interpreting a statute after subsequent legislative action
Provide for Montana’s future homesteading act
Requiring acceptance of religious or conscience exemptions to immunizations
Generally revise partner family member assault laws to prevent victim from being charged with assault
Establish temporary hardship law
Revise legal requirement of standing to maintain a lawsuit

Require disclosures of AI use by online media manufacturers
Prohibit sale of electronic data to the federal government
